svg.text: Track Progress Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
Track Progress
Actor(s):
Regular User, System
Description:
Comprehensive progress monitoring system tracking user advancement through
five-tier ranking system with XP accumulation, achievement progress, and level progression.
Preconditions:
1. User must be logged in with active account and activity history
Main Flow:
1. System continuously monitors user activities and XP accumulation
2. System tracks current tier: Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, Diamond
3. System displays XP progress bar showing advancement to next tier
4. System calculates percentage completion toward next level
5. System tracks achievement progress across 20+ available achievements
6. System monitors match participation statistics and hosting frequency
7. System provides progress visualization in profile and leaderboard
8. System updates progress displays in real-time after activities
9. System maintains historical progress data for trend analysis
10. System provides progress insights and recommendations for advancement
Alternative Flows:
A1. Tier promotion: System celebrates advancement with special notifications
A2. Progress stagnation: System provides tips for continued advancement
A3. Achievement near completion: System highlights close achievements
A4. Leaderboard ranking: System shows relative progress compared to peers
A5. Progress sharing: User can share milestones with friends
A6. Historical view: User can review past progress and achievements
